column1: tossed up full on off stump, dug back to Rose
good length on leg stump, spins into the left-hander, turned off his hips to short fine leg for a quick single
full on leg stump on this occasion, tapped off his toes to deep midwicket off the front foot, only a single
quicker ball, full on middle stump, turned towards midwicket with soft hands, nice and early call for the run
full on leg stump, tapped off his toes to square leg. Man there
full on middle and leg, this is the one that goes straight through, Weatherald walks across to the off side (exposing his leg stump), and works the ball to short fine leg
full and wide outside off, spins away and over the tramlines
full on off stump, spins into the wickets, driven to mid off
full on middle stump, hit with the spin down the ground to wide long on, they walk through for the run
good length, but wide outside off, makes some extra room to cut, but straight to point
beauty! Full outside off, enticing the batsman to prod forward, he tries to cut but the ball spins sharply away from the left hander, and over his blade
full but outside off, goes deep into the crease and punches to cover
good length wide outside off, shuffles across to the leg side, but can't make do with the extra room. Cut once again to point
full on middle and leg, swept behind square, but mistimed. Stopped by the man at square leg
full on leg stump and he shovels this over square leg! Down on one knee and good use of his wrists to lift this over the infielder
full on leg stump once again, but can't produce the same result. Bunted to midwicket
good length on middle stump, hit down the ground to mid on. They want the single, but can't
good length on middle stump, rocks back and turns this off his pads to deep midwicket
full on middle stump, backs away far towards the leg side to make extra room, attempted slog down the wicket, but does not come off. Goes along the ground to Bailey at mid on
short on middle and off from around the wicket, pulled, and top edge takes it over short fine leg
much better line, back of a length on off stump, chopped away from his body to cover point
short and wide outside off, the ball takes off after hitting the surface. Attempted cut does not come off, deceived by the extra bounce. Sharp take from the keeper
good length on middle stump, nudged off his hips to the man in the deep on the leg side

short and wide outside off, tries to slap this over point, but the extra bounce takes the top edge. This time it flies over the outstretched hands of first slip. Archer's not finding his length this over
full on middle and leg, pokes at it with soft hands, trickles away to cover and allows them to scamper through for the single
overpitched wide outside off, forces Carey to stretch at it. Slogged back past the non-striker, but only to Christian at mid on
full outside off, and this time he doesn't waste this. Same length as the previous ball, and this time it's slogged over Christian at mid on
good length outside off, and it's crunched through the covers off the front foot. Slight adjustment to move towards the leg side, and it's sent to the boundary
low full toss outside off, bunted down the ground to mid off. Can't make use of this loose delivery
fuller ball, lands on middle and spins towards off, driven down the ground to long on
full on middle stump, driven in front of square on the off side
short on off stump, pulled along the ground to square leg. Starts off with the bouncer
short again on off stump, swivels and pulls with ease on this occasion. Soars over the short boundary on the leg side. Not a great delivery with fine leg inside the circle
good length outside off, glances it down to third man

good length on off stump, angling into Carey, and he pulls awkwardly towards the leg side. Enough muscle behind that shot, lands just beyond the ropes at cow corner. Beautiful sound off the bat. Flat six
first real change of pace, the cutter lands on a good length on middle stump, the batsman has to check his shot. Defended
slower ball to end the over, full on middle and leg, tapped towards the leg side for a quick run
full just outside off, hit back to the bowler off the front foot
full and wide outside off, stretches outside the line and sweeps in front of square, work for the man at wide long on
back of a length outside off, carved off the back foot to point off
good length outside off, straightens after pitching, cut to point but with no power behind it
good length outside off, spins into Weatherald. Steps forward and tries to slog towards the leg side, but the ball goes between bat and pad
full just outside off, crunched past cover off the front foot

good length on middle stump, cut late from top of off stump past point, work for the man in deep extra cover, and he can't stop this either. Valiant chase from Short in the deep/ That's his highest score of the season
good length just outside off, mistimes his cut square to the man in the deep
full outside off, angling further away, tries to drive over square but a thick edge takes it behind square instead. Goes just over point, and then there's no stopping that ball
low, dipping yorker on middle stump, hit back at Christian but the batsman's out of the ground. Turns and throws at the stumps but misses. Forced the batsman to dive into the crease
full on middle stump, bunted down the ground past the non-striker to long off. No control behind that shot
overpitched just outside off, hit through the covers, more work for Short in the deep. This time he manages to parry it in, great effort in the deep
short outside off, spins into the left hander, tries to cut extravagantly, but sliced towards point

that's tossed up on off stump, and he's quick to pounce onto that! Wonderful extension of the hands to slog sweep over cow corner. Taken by a spectator in the stands. Converted that overpitched ball into a full toss by stretching forward and judging the length
full on off stump, driven to mid off
back of a length outside off, rocks back and cuts to point. Mistimed, therefore allowing them to race across
good length on off stump, shimmies down the wickets and muscles this cross-batted shot towards deep midwicket. Two men in the deep there
back of a length outside of, cut away from his body past the infielders

full outside off, and that's slogged towards the leg side. Two fielders in the deep converging, but Boyce - running in from deep midwicket - decides to let it go. Pulls out of the catch as he sees long on approaching. Communication breakdown
good length on middle stump, punched to cover
punished! Low full toss outside off, and once again it's flicked over the deep! What great timing that even a mis-hit slog can clear cow corner with that ease
full outside off, tapped to point
fuller ball on off stump, hit down the ground past the bowler to long off
good length outside off, spins away, cut to cover point and they're taking a dangerous run. Great throw from the fielder, and the bails are removed by the keeper, but the dive saves the batsman
good length on middle stump, angling down the leg stump, tries to glance this fine but takes the leading edge to square leg. There's his fifty!
short ball, but very slow. Lobs over Weatherald's shoulder as he gets out of the line of the ball
another change up, good length on off stump, hit to mid on for a run
full on middle stump, slow once again, tries to slog after backing away, takes the top edge. In the air, but lands safe. Just near square leg
good length but wide outside off, cut off the back foot past cover. Straight to Rearson in the deep, but misfielded! Goes through his fingers, and into the ropes. Sloppy
yorker on leg stump, squeezed down the ground to long on
good length on middle, angling into the left-hander. No foot movement from Carey, just opens the bat's face as it pings the blade and goes down to third man. Simply directs the ball to the fielder
short on off, and he's gets over it in a flash! Pulled from his hips and it's whipped well. Over deep backward square. Another crowd catch
good length outside off, carved off the back foot to point. Stopped by the fielder by running to his left
slower ball, on a good length. Lands on off stump, defended back to the bowler. Checks his shot this time

good length on off, and it's too low for the pull. MIsses the shot, as the ball crashes into his pads. Hits the back leg, and looked very out. Seemed like the ball would've crashed into middle stump. Unlucky Archer
slow ball wide outside off, it's a high full toss that the batsman can't put away. Slog does not come off, takes the inside edge onto his boots. No ball for height
short on off stump, pulls but takes the top edge. Wade's getting under it, but realises it's a free hit. Lets it drop near short leg
full on middle and off, whipped to midwicket off the front foot
full on middle, quick to get down on one knee and swept to deep backward square
good length on middle and leg, slog sweep from Carey, and that flies over the man at deep midwicket. Big stride forward and dispatched after getting down on one knee
low yorker on leg stump, hit back straight past the bowler. Just misses the stumps at the non-striker's. Intercepted by long off
beats Archer at fine leg! Full on middle and leg, swept fine down the leg side. Archer's racing behind it, but his dive can't stop the ball. Four more!
full on off stump, tapped down the ground to long on
good length outside off, mistimes his cut to point but they'll take the run anyway. That's Weatherald's fifty as well!
full on middle stump, crunched off the front foot past cover, regulation stop from Short in the deep. But, oh no! This is like deja vu, misfield at the same spot. Dribbles away for another boundary
yorker on leg stump, tapped down the ground. Stopped well by the bowler on his follow through
great yorker just outside off, dug back to Christian off the bat's toe. It's cracked. We need a new bat
waist-high full toss outside off, smacked along the ground to cow corner. Man there
backs away towards the leg side, but the bowler follows him. Good length on leg stump and going down the leg side, but cramps the batsman. Mistimed punch off the back foot
short ball on off stump, but it's the slower one again. Weatherald tries to swat this away towards the leg side but misses the shot. Had to wait for ages. That's the first-bouncer, says the umpire
full on leg stump, can't whip this away past square leg, hits his pads instead. They race through for a quick run though
short outside off, enough time to get behind this slower delivery. Turned from near his head to deep midwicket. Safe shot, played along the ground
drilled full and wide outside off, angling into the batsman as he charges down the wicket, too close to his body for the cut, takes the inside edge through to Wade. They race across anyway
low full toss outside leg stump, the batsman was backing away anyway, so it's mistimed down to fine leg. Tried to play straight, but once again the inside edge comes into play
overpitched outside off, and it's skinned! Hit really hard over midwicket, and threads the gap between the two infielders in the deep. Crashes into the cow corner boundary
good length on off stump, slogged away but it lands just short of long on. Awkward bounce as the fielder tried to get behind the ball, misfielded and another boundary
good length on off stump, tapped to cover. No run this time

full and wide outside off, angling further away from the left-hander, forces him to stretch, but he gets the toe end of the bat. Flies past the diving short third-man fielder. Tough for Christian. Terrific delivery, but well improved by Carey
well improvised! Full toss on middle stump, but he walks across to the off side and paddles this past Wade's right. Beautiful connection
Twenty two off the over! Good length on middle, and it's slogged over deep midwicket. Dances down the ground and sends this for half a dozen
full on leg stump, swept beautifully off the half-volley over the square-leg umpire's head. Sweet hit!
back of a length outside off, rocks back and cuts to the man in the deep
tossed up full outside off, comes down the ground and smacks this over the non-striker's head. Does not get to the pitch of the ball, but has enough power behind that shot to beat long off. Oof
full and wide outside off, swept square to deep midwicket. There's the hundred for Carey! Applause all around. What a cracking innings
Huuuuge! full outside off, and he's down one one knee to smack this over the bowler's head. Lands just short of the sight screen. Great crack
full on off stump, tries to sweep but takes a top edge. Falls safely near square leg once more
full and wide outside off, can't carve this away. Through to Wade
terrific delivery! Yorker outside leg stump, cramped for room. Slides through between bat and pad
full on middle and leg, attacking the pads once again. Can't hit this towards the leg side, takes his pads. Through to square leg

another Archer special! Full on middle stump, dug back towards the non-striker. Archer races across to his left, dives to stop the ball, and then throws the stumps down while being on the floor. Breaks the wicket at the non-striker's end. Who is out?! Both batsmen were near the middle. The umpires aren't sure who's out... okay, it's Weatherald.
Archer does not miss his target! Full on middle stump, and the yorker gets Carey. Tried to hit straight, but the pace was too much. Well-directed yorker, and earns Archer a wicket
yorker on leg stump, straight on the toe. They steal a single anyway. An excellent over. Only two runs off it
full and wide outside off, lifted over cover with ease. Gets under the delivery, and smacked over the off side. Beats deep extra cover as well
slower ball on leg stump, tries to wind up and pull over fine leg, but the pace deceives him. Hits the shoulder of his bat
slower ball, good length on middle, cut late to backward point. Only a single
good length on off stump, mistimed pull played over the infield. Man in the deep, though
full ball outside off, but another change up. Crunched off the front foot to deep extra cover. Tough to get under that delivery
short outside off, slow  once again, turned to deep backwards square with soft hands. They call early for the second, given how gently he played the shot
yorker to start the over, full on leg stump, dug away towards the bowler's left
overpitched on middle stump, tries to make some room and carve it past cover, but mistimed
overpitched wide outside off, bunted down the ground. They scamper through for the run. Tight first-half of the over

plumb! Full on middle and off, Wells tries to paddle this fine by walking across to the off side. But the ball crashes into his left boot, which is in front of middle stump. Easy decision for the umpire
waist-high full toss outside off, that the batsman meets by coming down the ground. Uses his bottom hand to carve this past backward point. Beats the man in the deep as well. Useful boundary
Archer takes his third! Yorker on middle stump, and the batsman's been floored. Toe-crushing yorker, and that's another wicket to end the innings. Strikers finish on 4 for 187
tossed up on middle stump, well controlled delivery. Defended off the front foot
full outside off, crunched towards cover, but well stopped by the fielder
beauty! Good length outside off, straightens after pitching, slides through bat and pad as he attempts a cut
good length on middle, punched down the ground to mid on
tossed up on off stump, and that's gently lifted over mid on. Lands just short of the ropes, but the infielders do well to pull this back
full on middle, whipped off his toes to deep backward squre
good length on off stump, angling away from the left hander, misses the back-foot punch .Through to the keeper
good length on leg stump, tries to flick off his hips but misses. Comes off his body through to square leg
overpitched on off stump, squeezed back to the bowler
pitched short on leg stump, Short gets under the line of the delivery by dropping his knees
full on off stump, driven away from his body to cover. Bunted, really. No real timing
yorker on off stump, turned off his toes to midwicket. Tight start from Stanlake
short on middle stump, wild slog attempted from Short, but can't connect. Through to the keeper

good length on middle, and that's smacked! Pulled over the leg side, and hits the ropes on the full. The umpire's need to have a second look. The shot: quick to get into position and swiveled with disdain to punish this short ball.
good length on middle and leg, muscled over the bowler's head. Not timed well, but that will allow them to take the second
Another maximum! Pin drop silence at the Adelaide Oval. Short on middle, and pulled away with precision. This time it's hit slightly in front of square
low full toss outside off, backs away getting his front foot out of the way, and muscles this over cover. Hit well enough to earn him another four. Red-hot form

full on off stump, mistimed drive down the ground. It's taken the edge, but whose gonna get behind it? Jono Wells, racing back from cover, does, but dropped!! Difficult take, but looked like he had made the ground that was needed. Just coudn't execute the catch
back of a length outside off, stays on the back foot and carves to point
back of a length outside off, cut off the back foot past backward point. Races away after clearing the infield. Powerfully struck
short outside off, Doolan sways away from the line of the ball. Taken by the keeper from near his head
full on off stump, almost a yorker this time. Dug back down the ground to long off
short once again, pitches on middle and leg, and soars over the batsman's head. The batsman's surprised that's not a no ball
good length on middle stump, carved off the back foot to backward point. Sharp interception from the fielder
full outside off, spins away from the batsman. Tries to drive but misses
back of a length on middle stump, it's the wrong'un and slides down the leg side. He attempted to pull this nonetheless
good length on off stump, tapped past Rashid to mid on
back of a length on middle stump, spins into him, turned off his hips to midwicket
flatter ball, short on middle, but zipping straight through. Rocks back inside the crease and mistimes a cross-batted shot to midwicket
good length on middle, forces the batsman to prod forward. Spins across down the leg side, but takes his thigh pad
back of a length on off stump, spins further away, cut off the back foot to cover point. Four runs to start the over
overpitched full on middle stump, slight tail in, defended back to Laughlin
full just outside off, firmly hit to mid off, forcing the fielder to run to his left
back of a length on middle stump, pulled along the ground to midwicket
full on middle stump, muscled away towards midwicket. Not timed well
very short on middle stump, soars over the batsman's head. He didn't even have to duck. Extras
that's a biggie! Lands into the Chappell stand! Good length on leg stump, but tailing into Short. Just in the slot to be hit, and it's slogged over deep midwicket. Full follow through of the bat
full on off stump, tries to drive down the ground but flies past the outside edge
good length just outside off, punched off the back foot to point
good length just outside off, pulled along the ground to midwicket. They scamper across
yorker on middle stump, inside edged into the batsman's boot
full on leg stump, whipped off his legs to square leg, but great stop from the infielder. Diving effort
yorker on off stump, dug back to Neser. Can he finish the over well?

yes he can! full outside off, enough room to chase behind it, but it takes a feather edge off the outside of the bat. Low take from the keeper. Carey's celebrating, and the umpire raises his finger. Short's stay is not too long today
full on middle and off, turned off the back foot to deep backward square. They're coming back for a tight second run, but well calculated
good length on off stump, worked off his pads to the man in the deep on the leg side
full on middle stump, and that's whipped off his toes with perfection. Just flicked over the square-leg umpire and beats the man in the deep
back of a length outside off, tries to work this towards the leg side, but the ball ricochets into his body after taking an inside edge
good length on off stump, comes inside the line of the ball and turns this to mid on
full on middle stump, flicked off his toes to the man in the deep on the leg side once again. Terrific three overs from Stanlake so far
back of a length outside off, tapped to cover for a quick run. Played off the back foot, so he's slow to start off the blocks. Takes a shy at the stumps, but Bailey manages to scamper across
good length outside off, goes back and punches towards deep cover
good length outside off, punched off the back foot but with no power. Straight to Laughlin at mid off, but he fluffs the catch while trying to dive forward. Simple catch, but dropped!
Good length outside off, walks across to the off side in an attempt to paddle this fine, but misses the shot. The ball goes over top of off stump
full on leg stump, almost a yorker this time. Dug away to long on
perfect yorker! Straight and full on off stump. Bailey backs away slightly to carve this square, and the ball slides under his bat
full on off stump, swept furiously over the infield. Man in the deep, though
good length on middle stump, wrong'un sliding down the leg side, but takes the outside of his thigh. The umpire has signalled wide, much to Rashid's surprise

back of a length outside off, legspin this time, tries to work it towards the leg side but plays down the wrong line. His back foot lifted slightly, and Carey is quick to take the bails off. Is that stumped? The umpires want to go upstairs. His foot was inside the line. Survives
full on off stump, swept along the carpet behind square to the man in the deep
tossed up full on off stump, hit down the ground to long off
back of a length on middle stump, paddled square off the front foot down on one knee
good length on off stump, spins into the right-hander, tries to pull but misses. Hits his body instead
full toss outside off, backs away and muscled to wide long on
full on off stump, goes across to the leg side and smacked to deep cover
yorker on off stump, dug away to wide long on
back of a length outside off, punched off the back foot with soft hands. No run on offer
chest-high full toss, but slower ball, so not really dangerous. Mistimed pull to deep midwicket. The back-of-the-hand delivery slipped off Siddle's hand
full outside off, mistimed with the bat's toe end to wide long on
yorker to end the over, squeezed away to the vacant mid-on region. Forces Siddle to give it a chase himself
full and wide outside off, sliced away over point's head. Too far for the man at deep extra cover
full and wide outside off once again, crunched past the infield behind square. Man in the deep on this occasion
full and wide outside off, slower ball this time that swings away from the right hander. Walks across to the off side but can't slog this away.

smacks his head! The back-of-the-head guard has come off. Short outside off, tries to pull but his face turned after he took his eyes off the ball. Crashes straight into the back of his head. That guard definitely saved an injury. The doctors are out, for concussion checks.
misfield from the keeper! Short outside off, but slower ball. Pulls over the ball, but since it kept low, it deceives the keeper as well. Through his legs
full outside off, and it's smacked over the bowler's head. Off the bat's toe end, but enough power behind that shot to beat both long on and long off
full on middle stump, turned off his toes to deep midwicket off the front foot
full outside off, muscled off the front foot to the man in the deep
yorker on leg stump. Bunted back to the bowler. Does well to get his bat down in time
full on off stump, slower ball. Tries a wild slog, but takes the inside edge. Beats short fine leg
dropped by Carey! Short outside off, wild slap at it trying to play over cover, but takes the top edge. Carey tries his best to pouch it, but can only glove it. Races away thereafter
full outside off, tough to get under this length. Driven to long off
a rare maximum off Rashid. Tosssed up on middle stump, but he slog-sweeps with disdain. Into the second tier.
good length on middle stump, tries to sweep down on one leg but the ball hits his pad. Big appeal, but it would've probably gone down leg stump. Close, nonetheless
good length on middle stump, quicker ball this time. Swivels and guides to deep backward square
good length, but pitches wide outside off. Spins away as McDermott tries to slog this towards cow corner. Not off the middle of the bat, falls just short of the man at cow corner
Another six! Tosses it up on off stump, and it's been lifted! Soars into the long-off boundary.
that's the third! Full on middle, and this time he sends it away down on one knee! Slog-swept off the middle of the bat. Falls in the stands beyond deep midwicket. Twenty off that over
full on off stump, tapped down the ground to long on

good length on off stump, backs away and tries to punch over cover, but takes a thick outside edge through to third man. Dropped! Peter Siddle splits his webbing while trying to take the catch. Thankfully, it's his left hand. Needs treatment. Apologises to the bowler right away
good length on off stump, tries a wild leg-side swipe at it, but once again gets lucky! Top edge over the keeper's head
good length on off stump, walks across to the off side and turns this to deep backward square for a couple
short on off stump, gets big on the batsman, turned to fine leg rather uncomfortably

back of a length on off stump, backs away and lifts over extra cover off the back foot. Falls just inside the ropes, and the fielder does superbly to parry this back inside while diving across the field
full outside off, swings away, stretches outside and drags a sweep to cow corner
full just outside off, bunted down the ground to long off, they want the second. Completed with ease
full outside off, carved off the back foot to the man in the deep behind square
low full toss outside off, bunted down the ground to long off. Falls just short of long off
full toss wide outside off, carved off the back foot over point. Man in the deep
yorker on middle and leg, tries to turn this towards deep backward square, but takes his boot. Impact may have bee outside leg
full outside off, walks across to the off side and sweeps away! Beats backward square and fine leg as well. Starts the over with a boundary
back of a length outside off, rocks back and cuts square, can't beat the man at cover point
extra bounce! Good length outside off, but zips straight through thereafter. Tries to cut but misses the shot. Sharp take from the keeper
full on off stump, and it's firmly struck to cow corner. Man in the deep there for that very shot
tries the reverse sweep, but doesn't pay off. Full outside off, but quicker ball on this occasion. Through to the keeper
full outside off once again to end the over, tries to push at it and takes the outside edge. Stopped by short third man
full and wide outside off, tries to drive but can't make optimum contact. Takes an inside edge towards mid on. Forces the bowler to chase behind it
slower ball full outside off, and McDermott hits the screws out of this! Big wind up, and smacked over cow corner. The catch in the crowd is dropped
full outside off, crunched over cover for two more. Effort for the man at wide long off, forcing him to race across to his left
overpitched full outside off, tries a wild slog, but the ball zips under his bat
chest-high yorker outside off, carved off the back foot to backward point. Misfield from the man, allowing them to take the second. Free hit coming up
short and wide outside off, tries to pull, but once again, takes a top edge. Flies over Carey's head. Useful boundary

taken in the deep! Full toss wide outside off, slapped over point, and straight down deep point's throat. McDermott has to go. He got a lot of power behind that shot, but the fielder was up to the task
full on leg stump, turned off his toes to fine leg. Only a single, gets Christian on strike
full outsie leg stump, makes some room and crunches this inside-out to deep backward point. Handy work near the ropes  stops the boundary
overpitched full and wide outside leg stump. Slipped out of his hands
backs away while Siddle's running in, low full toss outside leg stump, crunched off the front foot to cover
low full toss outside leg stump, Christian tries to paddle this down the keeper's left, but takes his thigh pad. Going down the keeper's left anyway, but he does well to dive and stop
good length on middle stump, the batsman had backed away too much. Punched past cover to the man in the deep. Too far away from the ball's length to generate any power
full toss very wide outside leg stump, but Siddle has basically just followed the batsman. Down on one knee to slog this behind square, but misses his shot completely. Hits his front leg
very full outside off, tapped to deep point. Christian wants the second, but slips while turning. Sharp throw from the deep, and he's short at the keeper's end. Good work from Carey too
yorker on off stump, tries to whip this towards the leg side, but can't get under it. Pace taken off the ball as well

waist-high full toss on middle stump, swivels and pulls but not off the middle of the bat. Falls between short fine leg and deep backward square. Free hit, but he could've really punished this loose ball.
full and wide outside off, Archer can't maximise the free hit. Bunted down to wide long on
low full toss on off stump, swings hard and wild, flies over point to the man in the deep. Sliced shot
full on leg stump, tries to whip off his pads, but takes his boot on the way down the leg side, effort for Stanlake, who does well to pull this ball back

good length wide outside off, Archer's premeditated paddle does not pay off. Misses that shot, and the ball goes through to the keeper. Adelaide Strikers win by 11 runs. They move to first on the points table as well.
